unnormalised: Arre yaar, pesticide usage is scary stuff! Especially around Onam harvest time in Kerala. My nani always says wash your produce thoroughly! Remember the Bhopal gas tragedy. We need better regulations, like, yesterday! What's IIT Madras doing about this? Even for something simple as biryani rice, those pesticides, no thanks! Farmers in Punjab are suffering, heard it on NDTV. We need organic farming, pronto.
